title: 19 April 2013

speeches.intro: 676. Dr C P Mulder (FF Plus) to ask the Minister of Basic Education:
speeches.text: (1) How many new single medium schools were established for each of the 11 official languages (a) in (i) 2009, (ii) 2010, (iii) 2011 and (iv) 2012 and (b) since 1 January 2013; (2) (a) how many single medium schools for each of the 11 official languages were closed (i) in (aa) 2009, (bb) 2010, (cc) 2011 and (dd) 2012 and (ii) since 1 January 2013, (b) for which official languages in each case was provision made at these schools and (c) why were the specified schools closed in each case; (3) (a) how many new dual medium schools were established (i) in (aa) 2009, (bb) 2010, (cc) 2011 and (dd) 2012 and (ii) since 1 January 2013 and (b) for which official languages in each case is provision made at these schools; (4) (a) how many dual medium schools were closed (i) in (aa) 2009, (bb) 2010, (cc) 2011 and (dd) 2012 and (ii) since 1 January 2013, (b) for which official languages in each case was provision made at these schools and (c) why were the specified schools closed in each case; (5) whether pupils who have been affected by the closing of schools have been placed in schools that provide tuition in the same languages as the schools that have been closed; if not, (a) why not and (b) how many pupils have found themselves in such a situation?

speeches.intro: 748. Mr R A P Trollip (DA) to ask the Minister of Rural Development and Land Reform
speeches.text: : (1) On what basis has the annual rental of a certain person (name furnished), the current lessee from his department of the farm De Hoop or Mutton Destiny in the Hofmeyer District in the Eastern Cape, increased from R33 000.00 pa to R155 000.00 pa; (2) has his department received any request from the specified person for support in repairing critical farming infrastructure such as fencing, stock-water provisioning and irrigation pumping repairs and maintenance; if so, what are the relevant details as at the latest available date;  (3) has his department (a) allocated this farming operation any mentorship assistance and (b) received any business plan proposals for this property; if not, why not, in each case; if so, in each case, what are the relevant details as at the latest available date;   (4) will he provide (a) an up-to-date, comprehensive report of all infrastructure and recapitalisation support from his department to the farm De Hoop or Mutton Destiny in the Hofmeyer District since the lessee took occupation as at the latest available date and (b) his department’s general policy and record regarding infrastructural maintenance and recapitalisation of (i) let properties and (ii) the said property in particular?

title: 19 April 2013

speeches.text: : (1) On what basis has the annual rental of a certain person (name furnished), the current lessee from his department of the farms Uitkyk and The Flat or Mzinsi project farm in the Hofmeyer District in the Eastern Cape, increased from R33 000.00 pa to R155 000.00 pa; (2) did he call all lessees and land reform beneficiaries to a general meeting in Gallagher Estate in 2010 to discuss the terms, conditions and rental payment agreements that would be applicable to the occupation of State land; if so, (a) have these conditions subsequently changed and (b) why have they changed;    (3) what steps has his department taken to address the poor state of (a) water, (b) fencing and (c) other critical infrastructure on farms Uitkyk and The Flat or Mzinsi project farm in the Hofmeyer District in the Eastern Cape; (4) what is his department’s policy with regard to properties and farms that are leased to land reform beneficiaries with regard to the provision and maintenance of infrastructure and has this been followed by his department in the case of the farms Uitkyk and The Flat or Mzinsi project farm in the Hofmeyer District in the Eastern Cape; (5) has his department allocated a mentor to the farms Uitkyk and The Flat or Mzinsi project farm in the Hofmeyer District in the Eastern Cape; if so, (a) what are the terms of the appointment and (b) has his department considered or assisted the lessee with the implementation of a business plan to make the property a viable farming enterprise?
